name: Quantum Corvus Quandary
description:
WASD / Arrow Keys: Movement

Left Mouse Button / Left Ctrl: Fire

Dodge walls on the left. Destroy enemies on the right. Collect 2X coins to double points gained! Holding the fire button will allow rapid fire, but will also slow down both ships.

Two ships are tied together through quantum entanglement. One's fate depends on the other. Win win, or lose lose!

*A visual glitch makes the player characters hard to see on the first play through. As soon as you click the Play Again button, they should be fine.

**********************************

All art assets were created by me during the jam. I also wrote the code during the jam time, though I referenced a few of my older scripts for creating "enemy" AI.

Tools used:

Unity - Game engine

Visual Studio - Coding

Inkscape - Art

Reaper - Music

SFXR - Sound Effects

thisartworkdoesnotexist - This site uses AI to generate new artwork. I used an image created by the AI and manipulated it with GIMP and Inkscape to create a tiled background.
